questions.question: Considering the visible contents and packaging, what primary foodstuff is contained within this flexible pouch?

What is the general shape of the food product package, in its entirety, as shown in the image?
From the visible portion of the foodstuff, what is the apparent textural quality of the contained item?
Considering the visible material of the package, what is the apparent material used for the main body of the packaging?
Judging from the overall design, what is the dominant color of the packaging's primary label?
What color is the apparent seal or bottom edge of the flexible food pouch, visible at the image's base?

What appears to be the primary method of sealing or closing the food package as visible in the image?
Based on the visual appearance of the contents, what is the apparent form or shape of the individual pieces of food?
What is the color of the smaller rectangular label near the top of the product's packaging?
What is the color of the text indicating the product name on the food package, as it appears in the image?

What is the overall condition of the visible packaging, is there any obvious damage or wear and tear?
